name: infomesh
displayName: InfoMesh â€” Free Web Search MCP
description: Fully decentralized P2P web search engine for LLMs. No API key, no billing, unlimited free search via MCP. Crawls, indexes, and searches the web through a peer-to-peer network.
author: InfoMesh Contributors

tools.name: search
tools.description: Search the web via the decentralized P2P network. Merges local + remote peer results with BM25 + freshness + trust ranking.

tools.name: search_local
tools.description: Search local index only (works offline, <10ms). Same filters as search.

tools.name: fetch_page
tools.description: Fetch full extracted text of a URL. Returns cached content or crawls live. Max 100KB.

tools.name: crawl_url
tools.description: Add a URL to the crawl queue and index it. Rate limited to 60 URLs/hour.

tools.name: network_stats
tools.description: Node status: index size, peers, credits, quota, analytics.

tools.name: batch_search
tools.description: Run multiple search queries in one call (max 10).

tools.name: suggest
tools.description: Search suggestions / autocomplete for a partial query.

tools.name: register_webhook
tools.description: Register a webhook URL for crawl completion notifications.

tools.name: unregister_webhook
tools.description: Remove a previously registered webhook URL.

tools.name: analytics
tools.description: Search analytics: total searches, crawls, fetches, avg latency.

tools.name: explain
tools.description: Score breakdown for search results: BM25, freshness, trust, authority.

tools.name: search_rag
tools.description: RAG-optimized search with chunked, source-attributed output.

tools.name: extract_answer
tools.description: Extract direct answers from search results with confidence scores.

tools.name: fact_check
tools.description: Cross-reference a claim against indexed sources.

tools.name: ping
tools.description: Health check. Returns server status and version.

tools.name: credit_balance
tools.description: View credit balance, tier, search cost, and credit state.

tools.name: index_stats
tools.description: Detailed index statistics: document count, top domains.

tools.name: remove_url
tools.description: Remove a URL from the local index.
